text: A Corner in Wheat is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithVlada PetriÄ‡. D.W. Griffith's A Corner in Wheat: A Critical AnalysisA CORNER IN WHEAT and stars Frank Powell, James Kirkwood, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Frank Powell as The wheat king * James Kirkwood as The poor farmer * Linda Arvidson as The poor farmer's wife * Gladys Egan as The poor farmer's daughter * Henry B. Walthall as The wheat king's assistant * Grace Henderson as The wheat king's wife * W. Chrystie Miller as The poor farmer's father ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. title: A Corner in Wheat
